name: Courtview Media
tag_list: digital-publishing, syndication, websites, media-companies, international, content, crawler, aggregator, aggregation, vertical, publishing
overview:
Courtview’s unique business is “Syndicated Websites”:

Courtview is an innovative digital publishing company which has just launched its first product, a football site called klikFC (www.klikfc.com). This is already syndicated in 11 countries; all to major media companies.

The unique business is “Syndicated Websites”:

  • CVM builds single vertical sites on a proprietary publishing platform
  • These are syndicated for free to a network of partners world-wide - customised and localised for each market
  • The content is from (i) the partners, (ii) from a crawler/aggregator and (iii) from users - and it is fully automated, requiring no manual input nor editorial oversight
  • Courtview’s media partners drive traffic to their site and sell advertising, sponsorship and e-commerce in their country
  • Courtview gets a cut of the revenue

The business will also aggressively scale by using the platform to create unlimited new products to meet the demands of our partners.

Courtview knows a lot about the weaknesses and the strengths of traditional media companies. All the traditional media companies struggle to develop and operate websites cost-effectively. CVM has developed a solution whereby traditional media companies can thrive profitably in a digital age.

By leveraging this and their powerful technology, Courtview can quickly and quietly become a leading international digital publisher.
